name: Graphcore
goal:
OUR PURPOSE

We’re optimistic for a future where people live healthier, more informed, more creative lives. We see a world where technology enhances human potential, and takes us into a new era of intelligence and progress that everyone can benefit from.

We know there are innovators who can build this future and we understand their ambition, and their challenges. So we’ve built a totally new processor which allows them to go for it. We constantly push boundaries so others can do the same.

The future is coming. We’re just bringing it closer.
interests: Competition, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
